mapper.select: SELECT T.PRODUCT_CODE, T.FINANCE_PRODUCT, T.FINANCE_TOTAL_LIMIT, T.ANNUAL_INCOME, T.EXPIRE_DAY, T.MAX_LIMIT, T.MIN_LIMIT, To_Char(t.Carry_Date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') Carrydate, To_Char(t.Carry_Date + t.EXPIRE_DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') Settle_Date FROM STOCK_FINANCE_PRODUCT T WHERE t.finance_total_limit > 0

select PRODUCT_CODE, FINANCE_PRODUCT, FINANCE_TOTAL_LIMIT, ANNUAL_INCOME, EXPIRE_DAY, MAX_LIMIT, MIN_LIMIT, Carrydate, Settle_Date from (SELECT T.PRODUCT_CODE, T.FINANCE_PRODUCT, T.FINANCE_TOTAL_LIMIT, T.ANNUAL_INCOME, T.EXPIRE_DAY, T.MAX_LIMIT, T.MIN_LIMIT, To_Char(t.Carry_Date + 1, 'yyyy-mm-dd') Carrydate, To_Char(t.Carry_Date + t.EXPIRE_DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') Settle_Date, publish_date FROM STOCK_FINANCE_PRODUCT T order by t.publish_date desc) where rownum = 1

select count(1) from STOCK_FINANCE_PRODUCT
where to_char(PUBLISH_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{date}

select Seq_STOCK_FINANCE_RECORD_ID.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO STOCK_FINANCE_RECORD (ID, TICKET, PRODUCT_CODE, FINANCE_PRODUCT, FINANCE_LIMIT, ANNUAL_INCOME, INCOME, CURRENT_INCOME, CARRY_DATE, SETTLE_DATE, user_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{ticket}, #{productCode}, #{financeProduct}, #{financeLimit}, #{annualIncome}, #{income}, to_number(#{financeLimit})*to_number(#{annualIncome})/#{currentYearDays}, to_date(#{carryDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{settleDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT TICKET, FINANCE_LIMIT, PRODUCT_CODE, INCOME, CURRENT_INCOME, TO_CHAR(CARRY_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') CARRY_DATE, TO_CHAR(SETTLE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') SETTLE_DATE, ANNUAL_INCOME, #{financeProtcol} FINANCEPROTCOL, (Settle_Date -To_Date(To_Char(Sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd')) num FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.ID DESC) AS NUM, T.* FROM STOCK_FINANCE_RECORD T WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) S WHERE NUM >= #{offset} + 1 AND NUM <= #{offset} + 20
select 1 from stock_user_wallet w where exists(select 1 from stock_user u where u.nickname = w.nickname and u.id = #{userId}) and w.balance>=to_number(#{financeLimit})

SELECT CURRENT_INCOME income, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.ID = R.USER_ID) NICKNAME, (R.SETTLE_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd')) num, FINANCE_LIMIT, ticket FROM STOCK_FINANCE_RECORD R WHERE R.CARRY_DATE < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND R.SETTLE_DATE >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd')
mapper.update: UPDATE STOCK_FINANCE_RECORD R SET R.CURRENT_INCOME = ((TRUNC(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd')) - TRUNC(R.CARRY_DATE)) * R.FINANCE_LIMIT * R.ANNUAL_INCOME) / #{currentYearDays} WHERE R.CARRY_DATE <= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND R.SETTLE_DATE >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd')
update stock_user u set u.ISSTOCK = #{isStock} where u.id = #{userId}
update STOCK_FINANCE_PRODUCT set FINANCE_TOTAL_LIMIT = FINANCE_TOTAL_LIMIT - to_number(#{financeLimit}) where PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}
update stock_user_wallet w set w.balance = w.balance - to_number(#{fund}) where exists(select 1 from stock_user u where u.id = #{userId} and u.nickname = w.nickname)

mapper.select: select (select u.nickname from stock_user u where u.id = r.user_id )nickname, TICKET,PRODUCT_CODE,FINANCE_PRODUCT,INCOME,CURRENT_INCOME,TO_CHAR(CARRY_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') CARRY_DATE, TO_CHAR(SETTLE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') SETTLE_DATE,to_char(r.BUY_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:ss')BUY_DATE from STOCK_FINANCE_RECORD r where product_code = #{productCode} order by BUY_DATE ,user_id desc

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO T, STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = T.NICKNAME AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT A WHERE T.OPERATE_ACCOUNT_ID = A.ID AND A.FUND_ACCOUNT = '63380003')

SELECT (SELECT C.TRUENAME FROM STOCK_ID_CARD C WHERE C.USER_ID = U.ID) TRUENAME, (SELECT C.ID_CARD FROM STOCK_ID_CARD C WHERE C.USER_ID = U.ID) ID_CARD, T.TRADE_FUND, to_char(T.START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:ss') START_DATE FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO T, STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = T.NICKNAME AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT A WHERE T.OPERATE_ACCOUNT_ID = A.ID AND A.FUND_ACCOUNT = '63380003') ORDER BY T.START_DATE DESC

select p.max_limit - (select sum(r.finance_limit) from stock_finance_record r where r.user_id = #{userId} and r.product_code = p.product_code) from stock_finance_product p where p.product_code = #{productCode}
